## Interactive Plot with External Data

This document contains an interactive Shiny app that allows you to explore data by selecting a numeric parameter.

```{r echo = FALSE, include=FALSE}
#| context: setup
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(secr)
library(shiny)
load("GADesigns.RData")
load("SCRObjs.RData")
```

```{r}
numericInput("rep",
             "Number of rep:",
             value = sample(1:100,1),
             min = 0,
             max = 100,
             step = 10)
plotOutput("dataPlot")
```


```{r}
#| context: server

output$dataPlot <- renderPlot({
  
plot(res.objs$`SCR Mask`)
plot(GA.designs$G4S1[[input$rep]], add = TRUE)
})
```

## About the Plot

The plot above shows a realisation from the GA4 design.
